name: Puzzle Purgatory
description:
Puzzle Purgatory is a silly "puzzle" platformer where the rules make less and less sense as you journey further through dreamlike chambers. Inspired by games such as This is The Only Level.

Not all planned levels are currently implemented, so it is rather short

Created by :

McJimbles

Tagtart

Special Thanks to Mark Birtley for the music, and Jorge Trevino for the pixel art wallpaper on the walls.

Controls:

The only controls you can know going in:

- WASD to move

- Esc to Pause, restart current level from pause menu

Known Issues:

- After completing the game, the save system is bugged until the game is closed and a new game is started after restarting.
